languages.text: "Подобно тому, как дети Азуриана заселили сей мир, что ты считаешь своим, мои собратья заполонили эту часть космоса. В отчаянной попытке выжить они будут искать убежища в твоих владениях, быть может — грабить корабли мон-кай в поисках ресурсов и пищи. Я не желаю для своих собратьев подобной судьбы. Ты же, надеюсь, не желаешь ее и для своих подданных".

"Just as the Children of Asuryan settled this world you consider yours, my kin have flooded this region of space. Desperately trying to survive, they will seek shelter in your demesne, perhaps even raiding mon-keigh vessels for supplies and sustenance. I do not wish such a fate for any of my kind, just as I hope you do not wish it for your subjects."
languages.original_text: "Подобно тому, как дети Азуриана заселили сей мир, что ты считаешь своим, мои собратья заполонили эту часть космоса. В отчаянной попытке выжить они будут искать убежища в твоих владениях, быть может — грабить корабли мон-кай в поисках ресурсов и пищи. Я не желаю для своих собратьев подобной судьбы. Ты же, надеюсь, не желаешь ее и для своих подданных".

Desperately trying to survive, they will seek shelter in your demesne, perhaps even raiding the vessels of the mon-keigh for supplies and nourishment. I do not wish such a fate for any of my kind, just as I hope you do not wish it for your subjects."

I do not wish such a fate for any of my kind, just as I hope you do not wish it for your subjects."

languages.text: 「アシュリアンの御子らがお前達が自分のものと考えているこの世界に定住したように、我の一族もこの区域に押し寄せた。生き残ろうと必死になって、彼らはお前たちの領地に庇護を求め、おそらく供給物と食糧を求めてモン＝ケイの船を襲うだろう。我は同族にそのような運命を辿ってほしくはない。同じように、お前が己の臣民がそのような運命を多そることを望んでいなければいいのだが」
languages.original_text: "Just as the Children of Asuryan settled this world you consider yours, my kin have flooded this region of space. Desperately trying to survive, they will seek shelter in your demesne, perhaps even raiding mon-keigh vessels for supplies and sustenance. I do not wish such a fate for any of my kind, just as I hope you do not wish it for your subjects."

traits.locale_text: 「アシュリアンの御子らがお前達が自分のものと考えているこの世界に定住したように、我の一族もこの区域に押し寄せた。生き残ろうと必死になって、彼らはお前たちの領地に庇護を求め、おそらく供給物と食糧を求めてモン＝ケイの船を襲うだろう。我は同族にそのような運命を辿ってほしくはない。同じように、お前が己の臣民がそのような運命を多そることを望んでいなければいいのだが」

languages.text: « Tout comme les enfants d'Asuryan qui se sont installés dans ce monde que vous considérez comme le vôtre, mes semblables ont investi cette région de l'espace. Ils tentent désespérément de survivre et chercheront à trouver refuge dans vos territoires. Ils pourraient même s'en prendre à vos vaisseaux mon-keigh dans le seul but de récupérer des vivres. Je ne souhaite pas un tel destin à mon peuple, et j'imagine que vous voulez également préserver vos sujets. »
languages.original_text: "Just as the Children of Asuryan settled this world you consider yours, my kin have flooded this region of space. Desperately trying to survive, they will seek shelter in your demesne, perhaps even raiding mon-keigh vessels for supplies and sustenance. I do not wish such a fate for any of my kind, just as I hope you do not wish it for your subjects."

traits.locale_text: « Tout comme les enfants d'Asuryan qui se sont installés dans ce monde que vous considérez comme le vôtre, mes semblables ont investi cette région de l'espace. Ils tentent désespérément de survivre et chercheront à trouver refuge dans vos territoires. Ils pourraient même s'en prendre à vos vaisseaux mon-keigh dans le seul but de récupérer des vivres. Je ne souhaite pas un tel destin à mon peuple, et j'imagine que vous voulez également préserver vos sujets. »

languages.text: “阿苏焉的子嗣定居在了你认为属于你们的世界。正如他们一样，我的其他族人也涌入了这片星区。为了生存，他们可能会来到你的领地，寻求庇护，甚至可能会袭击猴子的舰船，获取补给和食物。我不希望我的族人走上这样的道路，也不希望你的臣民落得不幸的下场。”
languages.original_text: "Just as the Children of Asuryan settled this world you consider yours, my kin have flooded this region of space. Desperately trying to survive, they will seek shelter in your demesne, perhaps even raiding mon-keigh vessels for supplies and sustenance. I do not wish such a fate for any of my kind, just as I hope you do not wish it for your subjects."

traits.locale_text: “阿苏焉的子嗣定居在了你认为属于你们的世界。正如他们一样，我的其他族人也涌入了这片星区。为了生存，他们可能会来到你的领地，寻求庇护，甚至可能会袭击猴子的舰船，获取补给和食物。我不希望我的族人走上这样的道路，也不希望你的臣民落得不幸的下场。”

languages.text: «Al igual que los hijos de Asuryan se asentaron en este mundo que considera suyo, mi pueblo está presente en cada rincón de esta región espacial. En un intento desesperado por sobrevivir, buscarán refugio en sus dominios; quizás incluso aborden a algún pobre mon-keigh en busca de suministros y provisiones. No le deseo tal fortuna a ninguno de mis semejantes, del mismo modo que espero que no se lo desee a ninguno de sus súbditos».
languages.original_text: "Just as the Children of Asuryan settled this world you consider yours, my kin have flooded this region of space. Desperately trying to survive, they will seek shelter in your demesne, perhaps even raiding mon-keigh vessels for supplies and sustenance. I do not wish such a fate for any of my kind, just as I hope you do not wish it for your subjects."

traits.locale_text: «Al igual que los hijos de Asuryan se asentaron en este mundo que considera suyo, mi pueblo está presente en cada rincón de esta región espacial. En un intento desesperado por sobrevivir, buscarán refugio en sus dominios; quizás incluso aborden a algún pobre mon-keigh en busca de suministros y provisiones. No le deseo tal fortuna a ninguno de mis semejantes, del mismo modo que espero que no se lo desee a ninguno de sus súbditos».

languages.text: "Genau, wie die Kinder von Asuryan diese Welt besiedelt haben, die Ihr als die Eure anseht, hat mein Volk diese Region des Weltraums überflutet. In dem verzweifelten Versuch zu überleben, suchen sie Zuflucht in Eurem Reich, überfallen vielleicht sogar Chem-Pan-Sey-Schiffe, um Vorräte und Material zu erbeuten. Ein solches Schicksal wünsche ich niemandem aus meinem Volk, und auch niemandem von Euren Untertanen."
languages.original_text: "Just as the Children of Asuryan settled this world you consider yours, my kin have flooded this region of space. Desperately trying to survive, they will seek shelter in your demesne, perhaps even raiding mon-keigh vessels for supplies and sustenance. I do not wish such a fate for any of my kind, just as I hope you do not wish it for your subjects."

traits.locale_text: "Genau, wie die Kinder von Asuryan diese Welt besiedelt haben, die Ihr als die Eure anseht, hat mein Volk diese Region des Weltraums überflutet. In dem verzweifelten Versuch zu überleben, suchen sie Zuflucht in Eurem Reich, überfallen vielleicht sogar Chem-Pan-Sey-Schiffe, um Vorräte und Material zu erbeuten. Ein solches Schicksal wünsche ich niemandem aus meinem Volk, und auch niemandem von Euren Untertanen."

languages.text: "Nasıl ki Asuryan'ın Çocukları, senin olarak gördüğün bu dünyaya yerleşmişse soydaşlarım da uzayın bu bölgesine akın etmiştir. Can havliyle egemenliğindeki dünyalarda barınacak yer arayacak, hatta belki de erzak ve gıda için mon-keigh gemilerine akınlar düzenleyecekler. Türümden kimsenin kaderinin bu olmasını istemem. Benzer şekilde senin de hiçbir tebaanın bunu yaşamasını istemediğini umuyorum."
languages.original_text: "Just as the Children of Asuryan settled this world you consider yours, my kin have flooded this region of space. Desperately trying to survive, they will seek shelter in your demesne, perhaps even raiding mon-keigh vessels for supplies and sustenance. I do not wish such a fate for any of my kind, just as I hope you do not wish it for your subjects."

traits.locale_text: "Nasıl ki Asuryan'ın Çocukları, senin olarak gördüğün bu dünyaya yerleşmişse soydaşlarım da uzayın bu bölgesine akın etmiştir. Can havliyle egemenliğindeki dünyalarda barınacak yer arayacak, hatta belki de erzak ve gıda için mon-keigh gemilerine akınlar düzenleyecekler. Türümden kimsenin kaderinin bu olmasını istemem.
